section.title: Overview
section.p: Bob has an iPhone, Blackberry, iMac, and iPad. All the four devices are provisioned in NCC with a Custom Data. The value of this parameter drives the Quality of Service (QoS) policy, for example, Aggregated Maximum Bit Rate (AMBR).

ul.li: Simulate attachment for the UE matching the iPhone. Verify if NCC responds with a policy setting AMBR = 50000 and QCI = 9.
Simulate attachment for the UE matching the Blackberry. Verify if NCC responds with a policy setting AMBR = 10000 and QCI = 9.
Simulate attachment for the UE matching the iMac. Verify if NCC responds with a policy setting AMBR = 50000 and QCI = 7.
Simulate attachment for the UE matching the iPad. Verify if NCC responds with a policy setting AMBR = 50000 and installs PCC rule 1Mvideo.

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.
